law.catch_line: Beginning in fiscal year 1982, the funding level provided by this State and its counties for special...
law.text: Beginning in fiscal year 1982, the funding level provided by this State and its counties for special education and related services for children with disabilities may not be less than the funding level for these services in fiscal year 1981 required under §§ 8-417 through 8-417.6 of this subtitle, as those sections were codified on June 30, 1981.
